text: I set the featured image in the website page "Featured Image" setting and I can see it on all social media channels except for LinkedIn, I can see that the HTML tags are set correctly in the `<head>` section. Can anyone please let me know what could be the cause of this?

I had a problem where updating a featured image wasn't reflected on LinkedIn, the only way we fixed it was to unpublish the page and republish. It forced the server to recognize the update within the social scheduling tool (unless you're sharing natively on LI, then I have no idea why it's not showing)
